title: Edible straws made by bacteria are better than paper or plastic ones
body: Technology Edible straws made by bacteria are better than paper or plastic ones. Plastic straws are increasingly being avoided for both health and environmental reasons, but the alternatives all ...
readable_content: New Scientist (2022-01-17): Plastic straws are increasingly being avoided due to health and environmental concerns, but the alternatives have various downsides. A potential solution comes in the form of edible straws made by bacteria. These straws are made from bacterial cellulose, providing an alternative that overcomes the issues associated with plastic, paper, and metal straws.
summary: The text suggests that there is a push to avoid plastic straws due to health and environmental concerns, but the alternatives have their downsides. However, there is optimism about the potential of edible straws made by bacteria as a solution to the problems associated with traditional straws. This indicates a positive outlook on finding better alternatives to plastic straws. Sentiment: 0.8
